title: City Inside/Out: Council Edition - September 2018
description: With a lawsuit looming, will city leaders be able to save the Showbox music venue from demolition? What's next for the troubled Center City streetcar? What are the objectives of a new City Council "select committee" on homelessness? Seattle City Councilmembers Rob Johnson and Kshama Sawant discuss these issues and more with host Brian Callanan on the September episode of City Inside/Out: Council Edition.
